item.title: Women’s Rugby Bring Back the Silverware
item.author: Katherine Fok,
item.description: In the final game of the season, Imperial needed a win against Kingston to successfully defend their LUSL title. The weather and train engineering works did not seem to be in the team’s favour but once on the pitch, little could stop Imperial continuing to play some magnificent rugby. The game began …

item.title: Imperial lose at Chichester
item.author: Katherine Fok,
item.description: Imperial’s 11 players were prepared take on the table-topping Chichester, who had yet to drop a point this season. The opponents kicked off the first half and chased well to settled into Imperial’s 22. They retained possession through numerous phases and combined well between forwards and backs. …

item.title: Undefeated Women’s Rugby top LUSL
item.author: Katherine Fok,
item.description: Having made a fantastic start to the season with two impressive wins, the fixture against King’s College London was eagerly anticipated, if approached with slight trepidation. In the previous three encounters last season, King’s had won convincingly on all occasions which led to their promotion in …
